title: Getting Started with QitOps
description: Learn the basics of QitOps Agent and how to use it effectively.

steps.title: Welcome to QitOps
steps.content: QitOps is an AI-powered QA Assistant that helps you generate test cases, analyze pull requests, assess risk, and more. This tutorial will guide you through the basics.

steps.title: Understanding Commands
steps.content: QitOps Agent provides several commands that you can use. You can execute these commands directly or use natural language to describe what you want to do.

steps.title: Generating Test Cases
steps.content: One of the most powerful features of QitOps is the ability to generate test cases for your code. Let's try generating test cases for a file.
steps.expected_action: Try generating test cases for a file using the example command or by saying 'Generate test cases for src/main.rs'

steps.title: Analyzing Pull Requests
steps.content: QitOps can analyze pull requests to identify potential issues, assess test coverage, and provide recommendations.
steps.expected_action: Try analyzing a pull request using the example command or by saying 'Analyze pull request 123'

steps.title: Assessing Risk
steps.content: QitOps can assess the risk of code changes to help you prioritize testing efforts.
steps.expected_action: Try assessing risk using the example command or by saying 'Assess risk for changes.diff'

steps.title: Using the Bot
steps.content: The QitOps Bot provides a conversational interface to QitOps Agent. You can use commands like !help, !exec, and !history to interact with the bot.
steps.expected_action: Try using the !help command to see available bot commands

steps.title: Congratulations!
steps.content: You've completed the onboarding tutorial! You now know the basics of QitOps Agent and how to use it effectively. Type !tutorials to see more tutorials.
